text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with puffy tacos that's right if

get started with this very simple dough
and we're going to start with the most
important and pretty much only

will discuss in detail on the blog post
but it's nothing more than a specially
prepared type of corn flour that can be
made from white or yellow corn and as
you can probably see I am using the
yellow corn variety which probably means
the white works better but who knows and
if you're afraid you can't find this
don't be pretty much any really large
supermarkets should have it as well as
of course any stores that specialize in
Mexican or Latin American products into
our masa arena all we need to add is a
little bit of salt as well as some tepid
water which is what people would like to
use obscure words call barely warm water
then all we need to do here is mix this
up preferably with a clean hand until a
dough ball forms which is only going to
take a few seconds so just keep mixing
and all that masses should pull away
from the sides and what we're shooting
for here is something wet enough not to
crumble apart but something dry enough
is not to be sticky so as with all
dough's you may have to adjust with a

but that's just you cooking I mean come
on is there anything more ridiculous
than an online recipe review for a dough
that says it didn't work because it was

that's all you so as usual don't be
shocked if you have to make some minor

very important once your dough balls are
formed
we want to keep a damp paper towel over
that while we work all right we don't

it's on to the pressing and some of you

but all we have to do is split open a

we'll just flatten out that dough ball a

that's looking pretty good right there
and as soon as our tortilla has been

when you put yours in it wasn't hot

what we'll do is we'll carefully slide

magically your tortilla is going to
what's the word I'm looking for
puff check it out
as soon as that's happened we'll give it

when these are done in a deep fryer
about halfway through the frying time
